verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <S%H8064><s%> The heavens מְֽסַפְּרִ֥ים <S%H5608><s%> declare כְּבֽוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> the glory אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> of God וּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָ֝דָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands מַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> sheweth his הָרָקִֽיעַ׃ <S%H7549><s%> and the firmament

י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Day לְ֭יוֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto day יַבִּ֣יעַֽ <S%H5042><s%> uttereth אֹ֑מֶר <S%H562><s%> speech וְלַ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> and night לְּ֝לַ֗יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> unto night יְחַוֶּה־ <S%H2331><s%> sheweth דָּֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> knowledge

אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There אֹ֭מֶר <S%H562><s%> [There is] no speech וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no דְּבָרִ֑ים <S%H1697><s%> nor language בְּ֝לִ֗י <S%H1097><s%> is not נִשְׁמָ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> is not heard קוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H6963><s%> [where] their voice

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֨רֶץ ׀ <S%H776><s%> through all the earth יָ֘צָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> is gone out קַוָּ֗ם <S%H6957><s%> Their line וּבִקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> to the end תֵ֭בֵל <S%H8398><s%> of the world מִלֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H4405><s%> and their words לַ֝שֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> for the sun שָֽׂם־ <S%H7760><s%> In them hath he set אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> a tabernacle בָּהֶֽם׃

וְה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Which כְּ֭חָתָן <S%H2860><s%> Which [is] as a bridegroom יֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> coming out מֵחֻפָּת֑וֹ <S%H2646><s%> of his chamber יָשִׂ֥ישׂ <S%H7797><s%> [and] rejoiceth כְּ֝גִבּ֗וֹר <S%H1368><s%> as a strong man לָר֥וּץ <S%H7323><s%> to run אֹֽרַח׃ <S%H734><s%> a race

מִקְצֵ֤ה <S%H7097><s%> [is] from the end הַשָּׁמַ֨יִם ׀ <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven מֽוֹצָא֗וֹ <S%H4161><s%> His going forth וּתְקוּפָת֥וֹ <S%H8622><s%> and his circuit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto קְצוֹתָ֑ם <S%H7098><s%> unto the ends וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there נִ֝סְתָּ֗ר <S%H5641><s%> of it and there is nothing hid מֵֽחַמָּתוֹ׃ <S%H2535><s%> from the heat

תּ֘וֹרַ֤ת <S%H8451><s%> The law יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תְּ֭מִימָה <S%H8549><s%> [is] perfect מְשִׁ֣יבַת <S%H7725><s%> converting נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the soul עֵד֥וּת <S%H5715><s%> the testimony יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נֶ֝אֱמָנָ֗ה <S%H539><s%> [is] sure מַחְכִּ֥ימַת <S%H2449><s%> making wise פֶּֽתִי׃ <S%H6612><s%> the simple

פִּקּ֘וּדֵ֤י <S%H6490><s%> The statutes יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יְ֭שָׁרִים <S%H3477><s%> [are] right מְשַׂמְּחֵי־ <S%H8055><s%> rejoicing לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> the heart מִצְוַ֥ת <S%H4687><s%> the commandment יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֝רָ֗ה <S%H1249><s%> [is] pure מְאִירַ֥ת <S%H215><s%> enlightening עֵינָֽיִם׃ <S%H5869><s%> the eyes

יִרְאַ֤ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD טְהוֹרָה֮ <S%H2889><s%> [is] clean עוֹמֶ֪דֶת <S%H5975><s%> enduring לָ֫עַ֥ד <S%H5703><s%> for ever מִֽשְׁפְּטֵי־ <S%H4941><s%> the judgments יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱמֶ֑ת <S%H571><s%> [are] true צָֽדְק֥וּ <S%H6663><s%> [and] righteous יַחְדָּֽו׃ <S%H3162><s%> altogether

הַֽנֶּחֱמָדִ֗ים <S%H2530><s%> More to be desired מִ֭זָּהָב <S%H2091><s%> [are they] than gold וּמִפַּ֣ז <S%H6337><s%> fine gold רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> yea than much וּמְתוּקִ֥ים <S%H4966><s%> sweeter מִ֝דְּבַ֗שׁ <S%H1706><s%> also than honey וְנֹ֣פֶת <S%H5317><s%> and the drippings צוּפִֽים׃ <S%H6688><s%> of the honeycomb

גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> Moreover עַ֭בְדְּךָ <S%H5650><s%> Moreover by them is thy servant נִזְהָ֣ר <S%H2094><s%> warned בָּהֶ֑ם בְּ֝שָׁמְרָ֗ם <S%H8104><s%> [and] in keeping עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> reward רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> of them [there is] great
שְׁגִיא֥וֹת <S%H7691><s%> error מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> Who can understand מִֽנִּסְתָּר֥וֹת <S%H5641><s%> thou me from secret נַקֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H5352><s%> acquit

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Also מִזֵּדִ֨ים ׀ <S%H2086><s%> also from presumptuous חֲשֹׂ֬ךְ <S%H2820><s%> Keep back עַבְדֶּ֗ךָ <S%H5650><s%> thy servant אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not יִמְשְׁלוּ־ <S%H4910><s%> [sins] let them not have dominion בִ֣י אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then אֵיתָ֑ם <S%H8552><s%> over me then shall I be upright וְ֝נִקֵּ֗יתִי <S%H5352><s%> and I shall be innocent מִפֶּ֥שַֽׁע <S%H6588><s%> transgression רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> from the great

יִֽהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְרָצ֨וֹן ׀ <S%H7522><s%> be acceptable אִמְרֵי־ <S%H561><s%> Let the words פִ֡י <S%H6310><s%> of my mouth וְהֶגְי֣וֹן <S%H1902><s%> and the meditation לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> of my heart לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> in thy sight יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD צוּרִ֥י <S%H6697><s%> my strength וְגֹאֲלִֽי׃ <S%H1350><s%> and my redeemer
